name: Udacity - Dark Mode
description: Completely overhauls the Udacity website to one that is easier on the eyes in low lighting. Only Classroom is altered, for now.
additional_info:
v1.0.7: Fixed new white elements. Inverted code editor. Changed banner color.

v1.0.6: Fixed more white boxes in settings menu. Began work on Udacity Profile.

v1.0.5: Fixed some white boxes, and inverted some images.

v1.0.4: Fixed text color in some alert boxes.

v1.0.3: Fixed additional white input text for quizzes.

v1.0.2: Fixed white alert boxes.

v1.0.1: Fixed white input text for quizzes.

v1.0.0: Initial release. Only classroom is altered.
